LanguageData.BuildBlackWidow.label: 制造 A-1BW 黑窗 步枪
LanguageData.BuildBlackWidow.description: Builds a A-1BW Black Widow Rifle. It is a highly accurate blaster sniper rifle with a high rate of fire. Effective against armor, shields, and biotic barriers。
LanguageData.BuildHarrier.label: 制造 A-6 塞伯鲁斯鹞 步枪
LanguageData.BuildHarrier.description: Builds a A-6 Cerberus Harrier, a short range, light-weight plasma rifle. These Cerberus blaster are fully automatic. It is a highly accurate blaster Cerberus’s elite troopers rifle with a high rate of fire。
LanguageData.BuildAvengerA.label: 制造 A-10 复仇者 步枪
LanguageData.BuildAvengerA.description: Builds a A-10 Avenger military-grade assault Multi-Blaster Rifle. Accurate when fired in short bursts, and deadly when fired on full auto。
